name: Bazaar Square
description: A central marketplace provides diverse goods and cultural exchange in a vibrant atmosphere. The commercial focus creates opportunities for profit and cultural exchange, while the concentration of wealth attracts both legitimate merchants and criminals.
atmosphere: Colorful awnings shade merchant stalls displaying exotic goods while dozens of languages blend in constant haggling. Spices, perfumes, and foreign goods create an intoxicating atmosphere. Cultural crossroads where distant lands meet in commerce. Every stall offers treasures from far-off places.
